name: Scatter Pistol
entries: This four barreled Pistol can either solve one small group of problems or four separate ones

items: While you have at least one round of ammunition, you may ignore the {@b Loading} property.
If you Scatter Pistol is loaded with all four rounds, you may perform a {@b Burst Fire} attack except it is constrained to a 5x10-foot rectangle instead of a 10-foot cube.

entries: {@Reload} on your turn only loads a single round of ammunition. Not all four.
